name: Charlottehaven
description: Located in Østerbro district in Copenhagen, Charlottehaven offers fully furnished, serviced apartments. This aparthotel features an on-site café, a well-equipped fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi and parking are available. Charlottehaven modern apartments come with a private balcony, fully equipped kitchen and a spacious bathroom. The kitchen includes a microwave, dishwasher and coffee/tea facilities. A washing machine and tumble dryer are also included in each apartment. The on-site café is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and serves a variety of modern dishes. During warm weather, guests can enjoy a glass of wine or a refreshing smoothie out on the terrace or in the garden. Guests can stay active and enjoy free access to the fitness centre, which includes a swimming pool, sauna and squash court. A variety of exercise classes are offered, such as spinning, yoga and zumba. Bicycle rental is available and central Copenhagen can be reached in 10 minutes by bike. Nordhavn Station is a 2-minute walk away which offers connections to Copenhagen Kastrup Airport in just 30 minutes. The sandy beach Svanemølle is just a 10-minute walk from Charlottehaven.

name: Skagen Strand Hotel Og Feriecenter
description: Right by Hulsig Station and 800 metres from Skagen Beach, this resort offers an indoor water park and free sports centre. Each apartment has a well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and a private south-facing terrace with garden furniture. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s apartments have a seating area and a private bathroom. All are equipped with a TV and a CD player. Some houses has a washing machine if not there are public washing facilities. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s water park includes a 48-metre water slide and sauna facilities. The sports centre features a gym and tennis, mini golf and badminton courts. Children can enjoy access to several playgrounds and play areas on site. Guests have free access to all facilities. The resort’s restaurant serves international and Danish cuisine. Free public parking spaces are found nearby.

name: Nexø Hostel
description: Nexø Modern Hostel is in the coastal town of Nexø, on picturesque Bornholm. WiFi and parking are free. Dueodde Beach, the island’s largest and most popular, is within 10 minutes’ drive. Communal kitchenettes and shared bathrooms are found on each floor of Nexø Hostel. Kitchen facilities include an oven, kettle and microwave. A laundry room is also available. The guest lounge or furnished garden are ideal for relaxation. You can purchase coffee on site. Sommerfuglepark & Tropeland is directly across the road from Hostel Nexø. It features a tropical garden and butterfly park. Restaurants, small shops and the popular waterfront are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hestkær Family Rooms
description: Featuring a spacious children's playroom with a ball pit and an outdoor playground, Hestkær Family Rooms offers pet-friendly accommodation in Grindsted. Legoland and Lalandia are only a 20-minute drive away. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, Playstation 3 console and video games. Some units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. There are 2 guest kitchens at the property and an outdoor barbecue area. Breakfast baskets can be booked on site. Guests can relax in the outdoor seating areas, while children can enjoy outdoor activities in the garden surroundings at Hestkær Family Rooms. You can also play table tennis and billiards at this hostel. Herning is 49 km from Hestkær Family Rooms, while Kolding is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Billund Airport, 20 km from the property.

name: Lalandia Resort Billund
description: Just 5 minutes’ drive from Legoland Theme Park, this property is one of Denmark’s most popular resorts. It offers a 10,000 m² water park and modern cottages with flat-screen TVs and patios. Lalandia Billund Resort’s spacious cottages feature open-plan kitchen/living rooms with a dining area. All have an electric cooker, microwave and dishwasher. A private parking space is found directly outside each cottage. For relaxation, guests can use Lalandia Billund’s indoor and outdoor pools, saunas and hot tubs. More active types can work out in the gym or book an activity in the sports hall. Children will enjoy indoor minigolf, bowling and the Monky Tonky Land play centre. Catering for all tastes, numerous restaurants and cafés are located on site. Cottages are set between 500 metres and 3 km from Legoland. Billund Airport is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Enjoy Resorts Marina Fiskenæs
description: This South Jutland property is on the Fiskenæs peninsula, 1 km from central Gråsten. It offers accommodation with a fully-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Leisure options include a water park and a free gym and spa. All apartments and holiday homes at Enjoy Resort Marina Fiskenæs feature a living room with digital TV and a DVD player. Guests can also enjoy a dishwasher and washing machine. Communal facilities include a restaurant, a private beach area and a climbing wall. A sauna, steam room and cold bath are among the spa facilities offered, and guests can book beauty treatments on site. A playground and playroom are available for younger guests. Enjoy Resort Marina is within 20 minutes’ drive of Dybbøl Banke Museum, while Gråsten Castle, royal summer residence, is just a 5-minute drive away. On-site parking is free.
